title: Emerald & Diamond Grandeur: A Modern Take on the Traditional Haaram
materials: featuring brilliant-cut Diamonds and Square-Cut Emeralds. Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting luster. Total Gold Weight: 108.360 grams (GH). Diamond Weight: 15.69 carats (2569 pieces). Emerald Weight: 12.60 carats (21 pieces).
features: This exquisite necklace showcases a contemporary interpretation of the classic Haaram. Each diamond-studded floral motif is meticulously crafted and interspersed with vibrant, square-cut Emeralds. The floral patterns have traditional elements, providing a blend of modern and timeless elegance. The diamond settings enhance the brilliance of each stone, creating a captivating sparkle.
occasions: or any special occasion where you want to make a statement. Ideal for bridal wear
while also sophisticated enough for upscale modern events.
description: This Haaram embodies the perfect fusion of traditional design and contemporary aesthetics. The use of high-quality diamonds and vivid emeralds ensures a dazzling brilliance. The Hyderabadi polish guarantees a long-lasting shine, making this necklace a cherished heirloom for generations to come. The intricate craftsmanship and unique design make it a truly special and valuable piece.
